creator: NightPay
descriptionHtml:
Get 66% discount and free entrance at +50 bars and clubs in Denmark before 24:00.

Triple-Up
As a member of NightPay you get a Triple-Up card.
With Triple-Up you can deposit DKK 100 on your Triple-Up card. NightPay will Triple-Up your money (3x), so you get DKK 300 to use at the bar - this is like getting 66% discount.
You can Triple-Up and pay as often as you want, at all NightPay venues in Denmark before 24:00.

You can use Triple-Up on all beverage purchases* before 24:00.
*You cannot combine Triple-Up with existing offers, promotions, bottles or tables.
So; You buy all beverages at full price, because your payment with Triple-Up is already equivalent to getting 66% discount.

Free entrance
As a member you also get free entrance at +50 bars and clubs in Denmark before 24:00.

Membership
Only DKK 39 / month, but the 39 kr/month is added directly to your Triple-Up account for you to use. Sign up today and get 14 days free trial.

+50 bars and clubs in Denmark
You can use NightPay at all the following venues:
The Australian Bar (all), Heidi's Bier Bar (all), Tyrolia Bier Klub, HIVE, Dorsia, LOLA, The Drunken Flamingo (all), LA Tequila Bar (all), Hornsleth Bar (all), Guldhornene (all), Stereo Bar (all), Rabalder Bar (all), La Boucherie, Butchers, Little Green Door, Den Glade Gris, Aloha Beach Bar, Andy's Bar, Bar 7, Bæst Cocktailbar, Tørst bar, Cucaracha, Da Vinci, El Dorado Bar, Farfar Bodega, Musen & Elefanten, Natcafeen, Rhino Bar, Sjus Bar, Aya Club, Andy's, Den Nordjyske Ambassade, Fabrikken, Giraffen, L.A Bar - Jomfru Ane Gade, Mexi Bar, Sprutten, Dampmøllen… and new places are constantly being added!
You can always get the full overview of venues in the app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
"Roses are red, and
Violets are blue
Updates are sweet, but not as sweet as you!"
NightPay is now updated with a new awesome midnight blue look.
And while we were at it we also updated the activity history so you now have a complete overview of your payments, deposits, and gifts.
"Dum di da di da
Dum di da di da
The only thing he said was..."
NIGHTPAY IS UPDATED

title: NightPay

creator: NightPay
descriptionHtml:
Get 66% discount and free entrance at +50 bars and clubs in Denmark before 23:00.

Triple-Up
As a member of NightPay you get a Triple-Up card.
With Triple-Up you can deposit DKK 100 on your Triple-Up card. NightPay will Triple-Up your money (3x), so you get DKK 300 to use at the bar - this is like getting 66% discount.
You can Triple-Up and pay as often as you want, at all NightPay venues in Denmark before 23:00.

You can use Triple-Up on all beverage purchases* before 23:00.
*You cannot combine Triple-Up with existing offers, promotions, bottles or tables.
So; You buy all beverages at full price, because your payment with Triple-Up is already equivalent to getting 66% discount.

Free entrance
As a member you also get free entrance at +80 bars and clubs in Denmark before 24:00.

Membership
Only DKK 39 / month, but the 39 kr/month is added directly to your Triple-Up account for you to use. Sign up today and get 14 days free trial.

+50 bars and clubs in Denmark
You can use NightPay at all the following venues:
The Australian Bar (all), Heidi's Bier Bar (all), Tyrolia Bier Klub, HIVE, Dorsia, LOLA, The Drunken Flamingo (all), LA Tequila Bar (all), Hornsleth Bar (all), Guldhornene (all), Stereo Bar (all), Rabalder Bar (all), La Boucherie, Butchers, Little Green Door, Den Glade Gris, Aloha Beach Bar, Andy's Bar, Bar 7, Bæst Cocktailbar, Tørst bar, Cucaracha, Da Vinci, El Dorado Bar, Farfar Bodega, Musen & Elefanten, Natcafeen, Rhino Bar, Sjus Bar, Aya Club, Andy's, Den Nordjyske Ambassade, Fabrikken, Giraffen, L.A Bar - Jomfru Ane Gade, Mexi Bar, Sprutten, Dampmøllen… and new places are constantly being added!
You can always get the full overview of venues in the app.
